name: Cucumber-Ruby
body:
## Installation Setup - MAC

* Install Ruby - brew install ruby
* Install Cucumber - gem install cucumber
* Install Capybara - gem install capybara
* Install Selenium webdriver - gem install selenium-webdriver
* Install Rspec - gem install rspec

## Installation Setup for Windows

* Install Ruby - [Ruby Installer](http://rubyinstaller.org/)
* Install Cucumber - gem install cucumber
* Install Capybara - gem install capybara
* Install selenium webdriver - gem install selenium-webdriver
* Install rspec - gem install rspec

## References

* Cucumber - [The Cucumber Book](https://www.google.co.in/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwirtvWf76jLAhVKCY4KHThVAcUQFggbMAA&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwiki.kuali.org%2Fdownload%2Fattachments%2F329384409%2FThe%2520Cucumber%2520Book.pdf%3Fversion%3D1%26modificationDate%3D1407504510000%26api%3Dv2&usg=AFQjCNEwixnbrWYSEM1teUwGcUIZDO8_0g&sig2=q5nKSM_mzfH9bQ5u4v2oiw)
* Capybara - [Cheat Sheet](https://gist.github.com/zhengjia/428105)
